channel.title: Redmi K80 Pro / POCO F7 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Redmi K80 Pro / POCO F7 Ultra MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.1.0.VOMTRXM Fastboot update for Redmi K80 Pro / POCO F7 Ultra Turkey
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K80 Pro / POCO F7 Ultra Turkey

Codename: miro

Version: OS2.0.1.0.VOMTRXM | 15.0

Size: 8.6 GB

MD5: 3ce26284f9e1927b467b99788a767b31

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to December 2024. Increased system security.
[Alive Design Philosophy]
Alive Design Philosophy unveils fresh, vibrant design across the whole system, making every interaction feel smooth and alive.
All-new Gallery:
With AI and reorganized collections, Gallery makes your memories even more vivid.
All-new Weather
Real-time Weather Engine 2.0 shows you the sky and clouds just like in real life – even lets you see rainbows and the Milky Way.
All-new Calendar:
The new Desktop calendar adds a touch of ritual to your day.
All-new Clock:
Updated Clock uses a more refined display structure for a more elegant, easy-to-read look.
Updated animations:
A full-scale animation upgrade makes every interaction flow smoothly and feel stable, responsive, and comfortable.

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.101.0.VOMTWXM Recovery update for Redmi K80 Pro / POCO F7 Ultra Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K80 Pro / POCO F7 Ultra Taiwan

Codename: miro

Version: OS2.0.101.0.VOMTWXM | 15.0

Size: 6.9 GB

MD5: e0e6993400e24a7b6106597e0e24322c

Changelog:
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases

Changelog:
[System animations]
New: During the process of opening or closing apps, the full screen indicator follows the window's movement
[System]
Optimization: System stability
Optimization: Improved charging experience in certain situations
Fix: Errors occurred in some cases
Updated the security patch to February 2025. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Xiaomi HyperAI]
Xiaomi HyperAI reshapes system apps with AI, enhancing productivity and usability and creating a dynamic, ever-evolving user experience.
All-new AI writing:
Generate, summarize, expand, polish, and correct text wherever you are with AI writing.
AI audio recognition:
Now, AI can recognize audio and transcribe in real time, summarize automatically, and mark speakers.
All-new AI search:
With AI search, you can find photos, videos, messages, notes, and recordings accurately.
AI reactions:
AI allows you to add effects to video calls with simple hand gestures.
